title: kalai magaLum
sahitya:
Kalaimagallum Malaimagllum potridum thirumagal alaimagale

Alaikadal Uditha adilakshmi 

Selvamgal alithidum dhanalakshmi 

Thiruvarul thanthidum dhanalakshmi 

Bhavabayam pokidum dhairyalakshmi



caraNam



Thamarai poovil Gajalakshmi 

Maga udan madiyil Santhana Lakshmi 

Veerathai alithidum Vijaya Lakshmi 

Arivai alithidum Vidya Lakshmi 

Mahalakshmi aval varalakshmi 

Mangala roopini Ashta Lakshmi
